title: Bond Yields Jump to Highest Since 2018
sub_head: Brent crude rises above $100 a barrel; stock futures waver ahead of inflation data
body:
U.S. stock futures edged lower and government bond yields jumped ahead of inflation data that economists expect will show accelerating price pressures.
Futures for the S&P 500 declined 0.1% Tuesday, putting the index on track to extend its losses after notching a 1.7% loss Monday. Contracts for Dow Jones Industrial Average lost 0.1%, while futures for the technology-heavy Nasdaq-100 hugged the flatline.
